name: Sturdy Monster Truck Tank Car Crush
name_original: Sturdy Monster Truck Tank Car Crush
description:
Are you ready for some rampaging, metal Crushing, chaos and carnage-filled car Crushing?
Then Climb up this Monster made for wild races, monster rallies, and car smashing events.
This game is NOT for the faint-hearted, this metal hungry extravaganza knows only destruction. But needs exhibiting of slick driving skills and ultra-efficient ruthlessness and smashing prowess.
